ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Animals Overhaul Reloaded
ModMetaData.author: kaptain_kavern | Dr_Zhivago
ModMetaData.description:
Dr_Zhivago has updated this mod further for RimWorld v1.0, upon seeing that Ludeon forum user "Caffeine Zombie" took the first and largest step to updating.
My Credits:
-kaptain_kavern for the original mod -🦉 owl for Westerado compatibility -Ludeon Forum user "Caffeine Zombie" for the original RimWorld v1.0 update
Original Mod Author's Thanks/Credits:
-A big Thank you to Oblitus : For fixing "pack animals" to be buyable
-Most Horns/Antlers graphics were made by Coercion originally for the TropiCKAPP Rainforest mod
-Also Mehni for pointing me to an error with the changes I made with cats behavior changes
